| History                 = The Dragon Clan is a [[Yakuza]] faction, which expanded from Japan to the city of [[San Francisco]]. Where they operated differently than they would in Japan, claiming to protect the powerless from those who would oppress and exploit them.{{r|Spider-Woman Vol 1 43}} To prevent a gang war in San Francisco, they convinced [[Jessica Drew (Earth-616)|Spider-Woman]] to stop the attempted assassination of [[Nguyen Ngoc Coy (Earth-616)|General Coy]] and the [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Kingpin]] by Deterrence Research Corporation.{{r|Spider-Woman Vol 1 46}}
